birds.name: Northern Cardinal
birds.description: A vibrant red songbird that brightens winter landscapes with its striking plumage.
birds.funFact: Cardinals mate for life and often stay together year-round!

birds.name: Great Horned Owl
birds.description: A powerful nocturnal hunter with distinctive ear tufts and piercing yellow eyes.
birds.funFact: Their talons exert pressure of 300 pounds per square inch - stronger than a large dog bite!
